original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
translated: and it brings about the completion of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /üîΩde la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
translated: ‚ÄúThey will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening that is the nonexistence of the entity of all phenomena.üîΩThey will not have the perception of an existent entity

original: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na /üîΩdran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na / dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
translated: or the perception of a nonexistent entity.üîΩHow could they have the activity of mindfulness,

original: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur pa lta ci zhig smos /üîΩrab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur pa lta ci zhig smos / rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: let alone be separated from mindfulness?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúSu¬≠bh≈´ti, if you ask how great bodhisattva beings should cultivate the recollection of the gods,

original: rab 'byor; 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @380b pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor; 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @380b pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: Su¬≠bh≈´ti, great bodhisattva beings, from the time when they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment, practicing the transcendent perfection of wisdom, with attention endowed with omniscience,

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste /
translated: Having realized that all phenomena are the non-apprehension of entities, they cultivate recollection of the gods.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skyes pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skyes pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skyes pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa'i lha dag dang /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skyes pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skyes pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skyes pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa'i lha dag dang /
translated: They bring to mind the gods of the Catur¬≠mahƒÅ¬≠rƒÅja¬≠kƒÅyika realm, the gods of the Trayas¬≠tri·πÉ≈õa realm, the gods of the YƒÅma realm, the gods of the Tu·π£ita realm, the gods of the NirmƒÅ·πáa¬≠rata realm, the gods of the Para¬≠nirmita¬≠va≈õa¬≠vartin realm,

original: gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: the non-returners who are in the form realm, and the non-returners who are in the formless realm, in the manner of the emptiness of non-apprehension of entities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: It is because they have no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who have no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //üîΩdngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o // dngos po med pas ni /
translated: are non-entities.üîΩNon-entities

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: cannot recollect non-entities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing /
translated: mindfulness and

original: yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: attention are absent.

original: lha rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: lha rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: This is the recollection of the gods.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti, in this way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, with respect to the reality of the essencelessness of all phenomena, should cultivate the recollection of the gods.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subh≈´ti, in this way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis spyad pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis spyad pa yod pa yin /
translated: there is a gradual practice for bodhisattva great beings,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
translated: there is a gradual training,

original: mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
analyzed: mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
translated: and there is a gradual path to enter.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings, training in the gradual practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
translated: training in the gradual training, and training in the gradual path to enter,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi @381a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi @381a *//
translated: by way of the reality of essencelessness,

original: tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: perfect the perfection of generosity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;üîΩthey perfect the transcendent perfection of patience by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of perseverance by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of concentration by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of wisdom by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of internal phenomena by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the external by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the internal and the external by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of emptiness by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of great immensity by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩThey complete the emptiness of the ultimate by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the compounded by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: @381b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: @381b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of the unconditioned,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of the unlimited,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,üîΩthey complete the emptiness of non-rejection,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of all things,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
translated: He perfects the emptiness of defining attributes by way of the non-entityness of defining attributes.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of non-observation by way of the non-entityness of non-observation.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of non-entities by way of the non-entityness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of essential nature by way of the non-entityness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities by way of the non-entityness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the applications of mindfulness by way of the non-entityness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs @382a *//üîΩpar byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs @382a *// par byed do //
translated: He perfects the right efforts by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the legs of miraculous power by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.üîΩHe perfects the faculties by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the branches of awakening by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble eightfold path by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the noble truths are perfected by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are perfected by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The immeasurables are perfected by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩThe formless absorptions are perfected by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The eight deliverances are perfected by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The nine serial absorptions are perfected by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the concentration on emptiness by way of the reality of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis @382b mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis @382b mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the concentration on signlessness by way of the reality of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the concentration on wishlessness by way of the reality of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the superknowledges by way of the reality of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilizations by way of the reality of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways by way of the reality of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the ten powers of the Tathagata,üîΩthe four grounds of self-confidence,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: the four analytical knowledges,üîΩgreat love,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: great compassion,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the knowledge of all modes by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.üîΩThey perfect the knowledge of paths by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @383a *//üîΩnyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @383a *// nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the knowledge of all aspects by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /üîΩde la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
translated: They will fully and completely awaken to all phenomena as having the entityness of non-entityness.üîΩThey will not have the discrimination of entity or

analyzed: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /

translated: Furthermore, Subh≈´ti, bodhisattva great beings who have set out for the perfection of wisdom from the time when they first set their mind on enlightenment should, if they want to complete the path of the stages of the way of entering, the stages of training, and the stages of practice,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: train in the perfection of giving by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThey should train in the perfection of morality by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: They should train in the perfection of patience by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the perfection of perseverance by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the perfection of concentration by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul @383b gyis /üîΩnang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //

translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the perfection of wisdom by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in inner emptiness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in outer emptiness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in inner and outer emptiness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the emptiness of emptiness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of great things by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of ultimate reality by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩOne should train in the emptiness of compounded things by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩOne should train in the emptiness of uncompounded things by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of what transcends extremes by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩOne should train in the emptiness of no beginning and no end by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of non-rejection by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of essential nature by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩOne should train in the emptiness of all phenomena by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o /
translated: One should train in the emptiness of defining characteristics by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩOne should train in the emptiness of non-observation by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos @384a *// po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o // dngos @384a *// po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of non-entities by way of the non-entityness of things.üîΩOne should train in the emptiness of essential nature by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the applications of mindfulness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the right efforts by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩOne should train in the bases of supernatural powers by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the faculties by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩOne should train in the powers by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the branches of awakening by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the path by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the noble truths by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the meditative stabilizations by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩOne should train in the immeasurable aspirations by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the formless absorptions by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas @384b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas @384b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the liberations by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩOne should train in the serial absorptions by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the meditative stabilization of emptiness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the signless meditative stabilization, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the wishless meditative stabilization, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the superknowledges, in the manner of the unreality of things.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in the meditative stabilizations, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the four fearlessnesses, in the manner of the unreality of things.

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnam la bslab par bya'o //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o //

translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the five clairvoyances by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in the six perfections by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in the four fearlessnesses by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.üîΩ‚ÄúOne should train in the four detailed and thorough knowledges by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

translated: ‚ÄúOne should train in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o //

translated: and there is a gradual path of engagement.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la bslab pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la bslab pas /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings, by training in the path of action that is gradual, the gradual training, and the gradual path of engagement,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: through the mode of non-entityness, perfect the perfection of generosity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Through the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the perfection of ethical conduct.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Through the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the perfection of patience.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of perseverance by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of meditative stability by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of wisdom by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.üîΩthey perfect inner emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.üîΩthey perfect outer emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs @385b par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs @385b par byed do //
translated: they perfect inner and outer emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of emptiness by way of the emptiness of non-things.üîΩThey complete the emptiness of the great by way of the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the ultimate by way of the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of conditioned phenomena by way of the emptiness of non-things.üîΩThey complete the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena by way of the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of what is beyond extremes by way of the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness that is beginningless and endless.üîΩBy way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness that is not discarded.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of all phenomena.üîΩBy way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of non-observation.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i @386a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i @386a *//
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they perfect the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they perfect the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they perfect the emptiness of the non-entityness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they perfect the applications of mindfulness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they perfect the right efforts.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they perfect the legs of miraculous power.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the faculties by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the branches of enlightenment by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble eightfold path by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.üîΩHe perfects the noble truths by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.üîΩHe perfects the concentrations by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the immeasurables by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the formless absorptions by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @386b kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @386b kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eight liberations by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the nine serial absorptions by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.üîΩHe perfects the emptiness meditative stabilization by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.üîΩHe perfects the signlessness meditative stabilization by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the wishlessness meditative stabilization by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the superknowledges are fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the meditative stabilizations are fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways are fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas are fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the four fearlessnesses are fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the four detailed and thorough knowledges are fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and great love is fulfilled by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of great compassion by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po @387a *//üîΩmed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po @387a *// med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of the knowledge of paths by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.üîΩand the perfection of the knowledge of all aspects by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
translated: He will fully awaken to all phenomena as having the entityness of non-entityness.

original: de la dngos po med pa'ang med na /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa'ang med na /
translated: In that, even non-entityness does not exist,üîΩso how could form,üîΩor feeling,

original: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
translated: form,üîΩfeeling,

original: 'du shes sam /
analyzed: 'du shes sam /
translated: perception,

original: 'du byed dam /
analyzed: 'du byed dam /
translated: volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: or consciousness;üîΩthe eyes,

original: mig gam / rna ba'am /
analyzed: mig gam / rna ba'am /
translated: the ears,üîΩthe nose,üîΩthe tongue,

original: sna'am / lce'am; lus sam /
analyzed: sna'am / lce'am; lus sam /

analyzed: ro'am / reg gam /
translated: tastes,üîΩtactile objects,üîΩor mental phenomena;

analyzed: chos sam / mig gi rnam par shes pa'am /

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: ear consciousness,üîΩnose consciousness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'am; lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'am; lce'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am /

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am /

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am /

analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am; lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'am /

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /

analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: It is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye,

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i @387b rkyen gyis tshor ba'am /
translated: ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: sa'i khams sam /
analyzed: sa'i khams sam /

analyzed: chu'i khams sam /

analyzed: 'du byed dam /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'am /

analyzed: ming dang gzugs sam /

original: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan yang ga la mchis; rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyang ga la ma mchis /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan yang ga la mchis; rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyang ga la ma mchis /

analyzed: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ga la mchis te /

analyzed: rnam par smin @392b pa las byung ba'i chos de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhal zas dang / btung ba dang /

original: na bza' dang / gzims cha dang / pho brang dang / yo byad dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par bgyid par mi 'gyur ram /

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa dang po'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa'o //

original: phyir sa bdun pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o; ;de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'o //

translated: Therefore, it is the morality that arises from karmic ripening.üîΩTherefore, it is the patience that arises from karmic ripening.

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus so //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan no //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do //

original: so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do //üîΩbyams pa chen po mi dmigs par byams pa chen po la spyod do //
analyzed: so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do // byams pa chen po mi dmigs par byams pa chen po la spyod do //
translated: They practice the detailed and thorough knowledges without apprehending the detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩThey practice great love without apprehending great love.

original: snying rje chen po mi dmigs par snying rje chen po la spyod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mi dmigs par snying rje chen po la spyod do //
translated: They practice great compassion without apprehending great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod do //
translated: They practice the distinct attributes of a buddha without apprehending the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sems can rnams mi dmigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams mi dmigs par sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: They bring beings to maturity without apprehending beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi dmigs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: without apprehending a buddhafield, they purify a buddhafield;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi dmigs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: without apprehending the qualities of a buddha, they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that do not apprehend a self, do not apprehend a sentient being, do not apprehend a life-force, and do not apprehend a person.

original: rab 'byor; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /üîΩde la bdud sdig to can rnams sam /
analyzed: rab 'byor; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na / de la bdud sdig to can rnams sam /
translated: Subh≈´ti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,üîΩit is hard for the evil MƒÅras,

original: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin no //üîΩde skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin no // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: or the gods in the MƒÅra class, to get at them.‚ÄùüîΩThe Lord having said that, venerable Subh≈´ti said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúLord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ji ltar sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ji ltar sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: ‚ÄúHow do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, in a single production of the thought, take up the six perfections?

original: bsam gtan @395b bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩtshad med pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan @395b bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags / tshad med pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the four concentrations?üîΩHow do they take up the four immeasurables?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩdran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the four formless absorptions?üîΩHow do they take up the four establishments of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the four right efforts?

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩdbang po lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags / dbang po lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the four legs of miraculous power?üîΩHow do they take up the five faculties?

original: stobs lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: stobs lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the five powers?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the seven parts of awakening?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the noble eightfold path?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding the three gateways to liberation;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding the four noble truths;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding the eight liberations;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding the five kinds of supernormal knowledge;

original: nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩphyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding inner emptiness;üîΩthey are upholding outer emptiness;

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding inner and outer emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding the emptiness of emptiness;

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags; don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags; don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding great emptiness; they are upholding the emptiness of ultimate reality;

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they are upholding the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena;üîΩthey are upholding the emptiness of beyond extremes;

original: mtha' @396a *// las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mtha' @396a *// las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,üîΩthe emptiness of what is essentially beginningless and endless,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: the emptiness of non-dispersal,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the absorptions.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold the four fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩbyams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa lags / byams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold the four detailed and thorough knowledges;üîΩthey will hold great love;

original: snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold the thirty-two major marks of a great person;

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: they will hold the eighty minor signs;

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis @396b bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis @396b bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa la gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;tshul khrims la gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa la gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;tshul khrims la gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, here the giving that bodhisattva great beings give is not other than what is held by the perfection of wisdom. The morality they guard is not other than what is held by the perfection of wisdom. The patience they have is not other than what is held by the perfection of wisdom. The perseverance they make an effort at is not other than what is held by the perfection of wisdom. The concentration they are concentrated in is not other than what is held by the perfection of wisdom. The wisdom they are wise about is not other than what is held by the perfection of wisdom.

original: su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩbzod pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // bzod pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: It is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩWhatever patience is cultivated, it is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.

original: brtson 'grus la gang rtsom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩting nge 'dzin la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus la gang rtsom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // ting nge 'dzin la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever effort is undertaken, it is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩWhatever concentration one enters, it is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩWhatever wisdom is cultivated, it is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;bsam gtan rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma
analyzed: shes rab la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;bsam gtan rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma
translated: Whatever meditative absorptions one enters, it is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.

original: yin no // tshad med pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩgzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: yin no // tshad med pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever enters the immeasurables does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever enters the formless absorptions does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du @397a *//üîΩma yin no //üîΩyang dag par spong ba rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du @397a *// ma yin no // yang dag par spong ba rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever cultivates the applications of mindfulness does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever cultivates the right efforts does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever cultivates the bases of supernatural power does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: dbang po rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the faculties is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the powers is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the branches of enlightenment is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the noble eightfold path is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the doors of liberation is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩrnam par thar pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
