translated: Whoever meditates on the noble truths does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the liberations does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the concentrations does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the formless [absorptions] does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang @397b sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang @397b sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the [eight] deliverances does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [ten] totalities does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [four] immeasurables does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [five] spiritual faculties does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [five] powers does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [seven] branches of enlightenment does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [eightfold] noble path does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [four] truths of the noble ones does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [four] formless [absorptions] does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [eight] liberations does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [ten] all-bases does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [four] immeasurables does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [five] spiritual faculties does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [five] powers does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [seven] branches of enlightenment does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩnang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩnang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the [eightfold] noble path does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the [four

original: phyi stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on external emptiness does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the emptiness of external and internal does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin paüîΩlas gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩchen po stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // chen po stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of emptiness does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the emptiness of the great does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of the ultimate does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of the conditioned is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su na pa las gzhan du ma yin @398a *//
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su na pa las gzhan du ma yin @398a *//
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of the unconditioned is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: no; ;thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: no; ;thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origin is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of what is not discarded is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of intrinsic nature is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of all phenomena is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of specific characteristics is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhoever meditates on the emptiness of non-apprehension is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of non-things is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of essential nature does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu @398b phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu @398b phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the meditative stabilizations does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whoever meditates on the powers of the tathƒÅgatas does so by being assisted by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the fearlessnesses is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //üîΩbyams pa chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no // byams pa chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the detailed and thorough knowledges is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.üîΩWhatever is cultivated with regard to the great love is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: snying rje chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the great compassion is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;mtshan rnams la gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no; ;mtshan rnams la gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin
translated: Whatever is cultivated with regard to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise. Whatever is accomplished with regard to the marks is embraced by the perfection of wisdom, not otherwise.

original: pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: and not otherwise.

original: dpe byad bzang po rnams la gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po rnams la gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: And the accomplishment of the major marks is due to the perfection of wisdom, and not otherwise.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @399a *//üîΩla de ltar spyod pa ni /üîΩsems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @399a *// la de ltar spyod pa ni / sems bskyed pa gcig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Subhuti: A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in perfect wisdom,üîΩhow does he perfect the six perfections?

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: How does he perfect the four applications of mindfulness, etc. to: the Buddhadharmas?üîΩHow does he perfect the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc. to: the enlightenment of a Pratyekabuddha?

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩgzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: How does he perfect the knowledge of all modes?üîΩThe Lord: A Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in perfect wisdom, perfects the six perfections by a single thought of enlightenment.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩyang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the four applications of mindfulness, etc. to: the Buddhadharmas.üîΩHe perfects the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc. to: the enlightenment of a Pratyekabuddha.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the knowledge of all modes.

original: dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the faculties.

original: stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble eightfold path.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the doors of liberation.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble truths.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the serial absorptions.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩnang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩphyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the superknowledges.üîΩHe perfects inner emptiness.üîΩHe perfects outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects outer and inner emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par @399b byed do; ;chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par @399b byed do; ;chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩHe perfects the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.üîΩHe perfects the emptiness of beginning and end.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩbyams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩHe perfects great love.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs @400a *//üîΩpar byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs @400a *//üîΩpar byed do //
translated: He perfects the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they will perfect the thirty-two major marks of a great person;

original: dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they will perfect the eighty minor marks.

original: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ≈öƒÅriputra said, ‚ÄúBlessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de /üîΩsems bskyed pa gcig gis ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa de / sems bskyed pa gcig gis ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings who are supported by the perfection of wisdomüîΩtake up the six perfections with a single thought?

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩtshad med pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags / tshad med pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the concentrations?üîΩHow do they take up the immeasurables?

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩdran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the formless absorptions?üîΩHow do they take up the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩrdzu phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags / rdzu phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the right efforts?üîΩHow do they take up the legs of miraculous power?

original: dbang po rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dbang po rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they take up the faculties?

original: stobs rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the noble eightfold path.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the gateways to liberation.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the truths of the noble ones.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams @400b yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams @400b yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the serial absorptions.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the higher knowledges.

original: nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold outer emptiness.üîΩThey are the ones who uphold inner and outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the ones who uphold the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they hold the emptiness of conditioned phenomena?

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they hold the emptiness of what is not to be discarded?

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: How do they hold the emptiness of non-entities?üîΩHow do they hold the emptiness of essential nature?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the perfect possession of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the perfect possession of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs @401a *// su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the perfect possession of the powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They are the perfect possession of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /üîΩbyams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags / byams pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin pa lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,üîΩ‚ÄúExcellent, excellent, Subh≈´ti!

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gtong ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa gang gtong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par gtong ste /
translated: Subhuti: Here a Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in the perfection of wisdom, gives a gift which is taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not make a duality of the giver, the gift, or the recipient.

original: tshul khrims gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par srung ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims gang srung ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par srung ste /
translated: He guards morality which is taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not make a duality of morality, immorality, or the moral restraint.

original: bzod pa gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: bzod pa gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: He develops patience which is taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not make a duality of patience, impatience, or the patient one.

original: brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par rtsom ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par rtsom ste /
translated: He makes an effort which is taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not make a duality of effort, non-effort, or the one who makes the effort.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu @401b phyin pas yongs su zin par snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: Whatever emptiness he cultivates, he cultivates it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever signless he cultivates, he cultivates it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever wishless he cultivates, he cultivates it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.

original: shes rab gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste; de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste; de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever conditioned he cultivates, he cultivates it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.

original: nang stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he cultivates, he cultivates it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he enters, he enters it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.

original: phyi stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: Whatever he realizes, he realizes it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he knows, he knows it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he sees, he sees it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he comprehends, he comprehends it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he realizes, he realizes it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he fully awakens to, he fully awakens to it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he attains, he attains it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: Whatever he manifests, he manifests it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have the notion that they are two.üîΩWhatever he teaches, he teaches it embraced by the perfection of wisdom.üîΩHe does not have

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no dualistic perception in that.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: there is no dualistic perception in that.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: there is no dualistic perception in that.

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: there is no dualistic perception in that.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes @402a *//
translated: The cultivation of the emptiness of the unconditioned is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom,üîΩthere is no dualistic perception in that.

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: They meditate on the perfection of wisdom.üîΩ

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They cultivate the perfection of wisdom, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of internal phenomena, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of external phenomena, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of emptiness, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of great extent, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the emptiness of ultimate reality, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They cultivate the emptiness of the unlimited, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of non-dispersal, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the emptiness of inherent existence, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of all phenomena, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They cultivate the emptiness of non-apprehension, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of essential nature, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of the absence of essential nature, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the emptiness of the essential nature of existence, but they do not have the notion of a duality.üîΩThey cultivate the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence and existence, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
translated: They cultivate the perfection of wisdom, but they do not have the notion of a duality.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no dualistic perception in that.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no dualistic perception in that.

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no dualistic perception in that.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no dualistic perception in that.

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang sgom pa @402b de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par sgom ste /

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mtshan rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mngon par sgrub ste /
translated: The marks that are actualized are actualized by being embraced by the perfection of wisdom.

original: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no dualistic perception in that.

original: dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mngon par sgrub ste /üîΩde la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po rnams gang mngon par sgrub pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mngon par sgrub ste / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the perfections.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the conditioned and the unconditioned.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the past, future, and present.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / ji ltar na /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the unobservable.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the intrinsic natures.

original: sbyin pa gtong ba dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: sbyin pa gtong ba dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the compounded and the uncompounded.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the past, future, and present.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the unobservable.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the intrinsic natures.

original: tshul khrims srung ba dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the compounded and the uncompounded.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the past, future, and present.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the unobservable.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the intrinsic natures.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the compounded and the uncompounded.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the past, future, and present.

original: bzod pa sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: bzod pa sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the unobservable.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the intrinsic natures.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the compounded and the uncompounded.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the past, future, and present.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the unobservable.

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the intrinsic natures.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the compounded and the uncompounded.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness of the past, future, and present.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the perfection of the emptiness

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: How does one cultivate wisdom without dualistic notions?üîΩHow does one cultivate the perfection of giving without dualistic notions?üîΩHow does one cultivate the perfection of moral discipline without dualistic notions?üîΩHow does one cultivate the perfection of patience without dualistic notions?üîΩHow does one cultivate the perfection of effort without dualistic notions?üîΩHow does one cultivate the perfection of meditative stabilization without dualistic notions?

original: shes rab sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: shes rab sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: How does one cultivate the perfection of wisdom without dualistic notions?

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid @404b sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /

translated: How does one cultivate the meditation on the emptiness of the ultimate, without conceiving of it as dual?

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: How do they cultivate the ten universal basesüîΩwithout perceiving them as two?

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /

translated: How do they cultivate the tathƒÅgata powers without conceiving of them as two?

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /

original: ji ltar na /üîΩbyams pa chen po sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na / byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: How do they cultivate the detailed and thorough knowledges without making any discrimination between them and the knowledge of all aspects?üîΩHow do they cultivate the great love without making any discrimination between it and the knowledge of all aspects?

original: snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: How do they cultivate the great compassion without making any discrimination between it and the knowledge of all aspects?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: How do they cultivate the eighteen special qualities of buddhas without making any discrimination between them and the knowledge of all aspects?

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sgrub pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /üîΩji ltar na /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sgrub pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags / ji ltar na /
translated: How do they accomplish the thirty-two major marks of a great person without making any discrimination between them and the knowledge of all aspects?

analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mngon par sgrub pa dang / de la gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: How do they accomplish the eighty minor signs without making any discrimination between them and the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,üîΩ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, here the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, having stood in the perfection of giving, give gifts without taking anything as a basis, and they do not discriminate that ‚ÄòI am giving a gift,‚Äô ‚ÄòI am giving this,‚Äô or ‚ÄòI am giving to this one.‚Äô

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: Subhuti: Here a Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in perfect wisdom, makes the perfection of giving complete.

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: And he makes the perfection of giving complete by having all the six perfections included in it.

original: de @406b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de @406b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: Here a Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in perfect wisdom, makes the perfection of morality complete.

original: de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: And he makes the perfection of morality complete by having all the six perfections included in it.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de; de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing bzod pa'i phaüîΩrol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de; de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they complete the perfection of patience. They make all six perfections come together in that perfection of patience and complete the perfection of patience.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They make all six perfections come together in that perfection of perseverance and complete the perfection of perseverance.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they complete the perfection of concentration.

original: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In that perfection of concentration, he includes all six perfections and perfects the perfection of concentration.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de //
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the perfection of wisdom.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus @407a *//üîΩpar byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus @407a *// par byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In that perfection of wisdom, he includes all six perfections and perfects the perfection of wisdom.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the applications of mindfulness.

original: de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In that application of mindfulness, he brings together all six perfections and perfects the applications of mindfulness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the right efforts.

original: de yang dag par spong ba der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de yang dag par spong ba der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In those right efforts, he brings together all six perfections and perfects the right efforts.üîΩ‚ÄúWhen he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the feet of miraculous power.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de; de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamsüîΩyongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de; de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamsüîΩyongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In those feet of miraculous power, he brings together all six perfections and perfects the feet of miraculous power.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do /
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the faculties.

original: de dbang po der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de dbang po der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In that faculty he combines all six perfections and perfects the faculties.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the powers.

original: de stobs der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing stobs @407b rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de stobs der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing stobs @407b rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In that power he combines all six perfections and perfects the powers.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he perfects the branches of enlightenment.

original: de byang chub kyi yan lag der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de byang chub kyi yan lag der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In that branch of enlightenment he combines all six perfections and perfects the branches of enlightenment.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they complete the paths.

original: de lam der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de lam der pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad 'dus par byas shing lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: On that path they make all the six perfections come together and complete the paths.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa gtong ba de'i tshe zag pa med pa'i sems la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa gtong ba de'i tshe zag pa med pa'i sems la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom and give gifts, they give gifts while standing in an untainted mind.

original: de zag pa med pa'i sems de la gnas pa'i mtshan ma dang / gang sbyin pa dang / gang la sbyin pa dang / gang gis sbyin pa dang / gang yongs su gtong ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de zag pa med pa'i sems de la gnas pa'i mtshan ma dang / gang sbyin pa dang / gang la sbyin pa dang / gang gis sbyin pa dang / gang yongs su gtong ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Standing in that untainted mind, they do not see a causal sign, a gift, a recipient, a giver, or something given.

original: de mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems zag pa med cing ser sna dang bral ba'i chags sems med pa des sbyin pa gtong ste /
analyzed: de mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems zag pa med cing ser sna dang bral ba'i chags sems med pa des sbyin pa gtong ste /
translated: That mind free from signs, uncontaminated, and free from the thought of avarice, gives gifts.

original: de sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: And that mind does not even see that mind.

original: ji ltar sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar sbyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //üîΩgtong ba po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: ji ltar sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar sbyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gtong ba po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

original: len pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: len pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: de @408a *// ltar chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de @408a *// ltar chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe tshul khrims de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

translated: How do the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas complete the successive stages of meditative absorption in all phenomena that are without signs, without anything to be done, without anything to be observed, and without anything to be produced?

translated: Blessed One,üîΩhow do bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas complete the emptiness,

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /üîΩrab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /

translated: The Lord said,

original: mngon par 'du bya pa med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong ba yin te /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya pa med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong ba yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, with a mind free from signs, give gifts in all phenomena that are without signs, without anything being done, unobservable, without production,üîΩand without being produced.

original: bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha @422a *//
analyzed: bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha @422a *//

original: dang / gnas dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang /

analyzed: mi'i cha sta dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo 'am /

analyzed: gal te de'i drung du la la zhig 'das shing 'di skad du /

original: bdag gis sbyin pa mi sbyin par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sbyin pa mi sbyin par mi bya'o //

original: nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //üîΩphyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of inner emptiness.üîΩIt is empty of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of outer and inner emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //üîΩchen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of emptiness.üîΩIt is empty of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of ultimate emptiness.üîΩIt is empty of conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of unconditioned emptiness.üîΩIt is empty of the emptiness that is the absence of characteristics.üîΩIt is empty of the emptiness that is the absence of extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: emptiness of nonthings is empty,üîΩemptiness of essential nature is empty,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: and emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is empty.

original: des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong na /
analyzed: des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen they see in this way that all phenomena are empty,

original: ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur /üîΩgang la yongs su bsngo bar @423a *//
analyzed: ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur / gang la yongs su bsngo bar @423a *//
translated: what is it that they dedicate?üîΩWhere is it that they dedicate?

original: 'gyur; gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gyur; gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te /
translated: And by what means do they dedicate?

original: de'i bsngo ba de lta bu ni /
analyzed: de'i bsngo ba de lta bu ni /
translated: Such a dedication

original: bsngo ba'i dam pa yin /
analyzed: bsngo ba'i dam pa yin /
translated: is the highest dedication,

original: dug med pa'i bsngo ba yin /
analyzed: dug med pa'i bsngo ba yin /
translated: a dedication free of poison,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo ba yin te; rab 'byor /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo ba yin te; rab 'byor /
translated: a dedication to the realm of phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: Subh≈´ti, those bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they bring beings to maturity in all dharmas that are without defining characteristics, without activity, unapprehendable, not produced, and not stopped.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: They take up a buddhafield.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the perfection of giving.

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: @423b 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: @423b 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩdbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs @424a *//üîΩpar byed do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs @424a *// par byed do //

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers of the TathƒÅgata.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

original: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects great compassion. He perfects the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin te /
analyzed: de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin te /

original: 'on kyang de'i yo byad thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub bo //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i yo byad thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub bo //

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni /

original: bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo //
translated: are produced just by their thinking of them.

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang @424b bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang @424b bsam pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo //
translated: In the same way, Subhuti, all the equipment of the Bodhisattva, the great being, comes about through mere will.

original: de'i yo byad de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed /
analyzed: de'i yo byad de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed /

analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do //
translated: and satisfies the world with gods, men and Asuras.

original: des sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des yang dag par bsdus te thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: des sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des yang dag par bsdus te thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jug go /

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
